channel.title: EXL-Fusion 317 | bosses | ingame music | minigames |
channel.description:
[center][b]Welcome to the Exl-Fusion advertisement thread![/b][/center]
[center]|[url=http://www.vote.exl-fusion.com]Vote [STILL UNDER CONSTRUCTION][/url]|[url=http://www.exl-fusion.com/client.zip]Play Now[/url]|[url=http://www.exl-fusion.com/forums]Forums[/url]|[/center]
[center][img]http://i.share.pho.to/280391f4_o.png[/img][/center][center][b][size=18pt]What is Exl-Fusion?[/size][/b][/center] Exl-Fusion is a brand new server! Still adding lots of content, and taking in daily suggestions from all our players! Please do not reply with a hateful "no content, get lost" comment, since we're still adding lots more things to make the gameplay better; with the help of you suggesting whatever in the world you want. Enough blabbering!
[center][size=18pt][b]Media[/b][/size][/center] [center]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yjowqZnVRIE[/center]
[center]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Otxguay8mf8[/center]
[spoiler=Some cool shops?] [img]http://i.share.pho.to/3ea63bb1_o.png[/img] [img]http://i.share.pho.to/e1d60eb7_o.png[/img] [img]http://i.share.pho.to/486d6c4f_o.png[/img] [/spoiler] [spoiler=Minigames] [img]http://i.share.pho.to/ae140eed_o.png[/img] [img]http://i.share.pho.to/f3e47830_o.png[/img] [img]http://i.share.pho.to/7bd24d65_o.png[/img] [img]http://i.share.pho.to/498ba33a_o.png[/img] [/spoiler] [spoiler=Bosses] Not all added yet! Nomad, Nex etc still being added :P [img]http://i.share.pho.to/1bfaab20_o.png[/img] [img]http://i.share.pho.to/9dc30d63_o.png[/img] [img]http://i.share.pho.to/3a8fa22c_o.png[/img] [img]http://i.share.pho.to/a9f0de9f_o.png[/img] [/spoiler] [spoiler=Random] Fully added music system - not ripped/made out of tutorial [img]http://i.share.pho.to/81678a2c_o.png[/img] [img]http://i.share.pho.to/7f9edb0e_o.png[/img]
Clan chat 100% [img]http://i.share.pho.to/d34f232c_o.png[/img]
[img]http://i.share.pho.to/fad35380_o.png[/img]
Thanks for viewing the thread, as I said earlier, please don't bash on about us having no content; we've merely just begun the development of this server, so I guess you could say a beta? However feedback on what we could add is always appreciated! Thanks, once again! :)

item.description:
@system wrote:

Damn! Hella fun at a PVP event, and apparantly there’s going to be a x3 pkp event on the weekend. Update being pushed until tomorrow, with a new boss being added :o

item.dc:creator: @tantriczzz tantriczzz
item.description:
@tantriczzz wrote:

thanks for you input sir, we got alot more things coming with the updates we just wanted to get a few suggestions from more people and mabey some of yall can get on and see what its about! we have a active 7 or more players but like i said we have alot more work to put into this keep a loo out for updates

[center]Welcome to the Exl-Fusion advertisement thread![/center]

[center][/center][center][size=18pt]What is Exl-Fusion?[/size][/center]
Exl-Fusion is a brand new server! Still adding lots of content, and taking in daily suggestions from all our players! Please do not reply with a hateful “no content, get lost” comment, since we’re still adding lots more things to make the gameplay better; with the help of you suggesting whatever in the world you want. Enough blabbering!
